Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which we believe would significantly enhance your operations and contribute greatly to your success. Given its value and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price. We kindly invite you to consider the following offer: $950,000. This price reflects our commitment to making high-quality solutions accessible while ensuring fair compensation for our investment and expertise. We look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable asset for your business. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We are here to assist you every step of the way. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
